reviewText: What a beautiful perspective of a fathers insight of his autistic child.
I saw the film today and it brought tears of joy that a strong father figure took his situation as a parent of a child on the spectrum and reached out to educate and support other male figures.

Incredibly moving and wonderful film.  A must see for families of children with Autism as well as clinician's, teachers, and anyone who will ever come in to contact with families who experience raising a child with special needs!

An incredible story that really takes a deep look into the masculine view on Autism.  This is not often a voice that is heard or even shared.  I found it to be very insightful and wonderfully detailed.  Definitely worth viewing whether you have a child with Autism or not.  It will enlighten you.
